caption.p: a Total lipid content (represented as line graphs) and FAME productivity (in bars) under control and nutrient-deprived conditions for day 6. Inset shows the change in FAME content with stress conditions, days of treatment—0 (control), 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 days. b Changes in saturated (SFA), monounsaturated (MUFA) and polyunsaturated (PUFA) profiles of fatty acids under nutrient-deprived conditions; N-, nitrogen deprivation; P-, phosphorous deprivation; S-, sulphur deprivation; days of treatment—0 (control), 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 days
